moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: Skull Bash
moves.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

moves.name: Shell Smash
moves.description: The user breaks its shell, lowering its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Withdraw
moves.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Clamp
moves.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

moves.name: Rock Polish
moves.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Hone Claws
moves.description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

moves.name: Fury Cutter
moves.description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Razor Shell
moves.description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This attack may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Cross Chop
moves.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: Skull Bash
moves.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
